name: Behind Lab 1337 Door
description:
You're a drone operator who is tasked to get your drone inside Lab 1337 and fix ... some "malfunctions".

Use arrow keys to control the yellow drone. Click on the drone to get some Bzz needed to get Lab 1337 back to power.

What's the deal with this mysterious lockout of Lab 1337, anyway? You  might find out the answer or ... guess and wonder about it.

Disclaimer: all assets used in this game is from kenney.nl.
